subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Sevilla got its season off to a glittering start by winning its fifth trophy in a little more than a year with a 5-3 victory against Real Madrid in the second leg of the Spanish Supercup. Frederic Kanouté scored three goals and Renato two, making Sevilla the winner by a 6-3 aggregate.
